relation: Great for these types of students
tons of clubs.. or start your own. it's really easy..
students trying to save some money or need some direction
Best option... affordable associates degree or transfer anywhere
I'm in several clubs and I go to a few bars and clubs around as well. theres always something fun to do.
restrurants around have decent student specials
Students tend to live in the neighborhood.
Tons of room to explore and learn
plan ahead and get registration/ financial aid done early. take classes with professors you liike Get involved, join a club
There's a lot to do and a lot of opportunities here. I really enjoy going here. Plan ahead.

textAfterTable: Jenny from Chicago, IL 06/05/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 of 25 Categories Comments Campus Safety the neighborhood is questionable but i felt safe in the school Greek Life Unaware Clubs and Activities many available Great for these types of students Students looking to get a degree, and not all the college life specifically Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus none Bang for the buck It is a community college IAI and accredited. I paid about 3000 a year on tuition, so you cannot beat that! Food and Dining the cafeteria food is lousy but there are a couple of nice inexpensive dinning options Dorm Life
